title: Weirdhouse Cinema: Next of Kin (1982)
itunes:title: Weirdhouse Cinema: Next of Kin (1982)
description:
In this episode of Weirdhouse Cinema, Rob and Joe venture down under for the 1982 supernatural thriller “Next of Kin,” starring Jacki Kerin, John Jarratt and a superb score by German electronic music pioneer Klaus Schulze.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
